Paragraph: OFETs devices based on PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO exhibit high carrier mobilities of 0.43 and 0.34 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 , respectively.

2. PzNDTDTBO

In the given paragraph, the materials being referred to are "PzNDTDTBT" and "PzNDTDTBO". These are organic semiconductors used in the fabrication of Organic Field-Effect Transistors (OFETs). Therefore, these two are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph.

Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: OFETs devices based on PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO exhibit high carrier mobilities of 0.43 and 0.34 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph presented as a Markdown table:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| carrier mobilities |
| 0.43 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 |
| 0.34 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 |

Note: I have assumed that "cm^2 V -1 s^-1" is a unit of measurement for carrier mobilities, and hence, included it as a separate property name. If it is not the case, then the table will only contain one property name, i.e., "carrier mobilities".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Upon closer examination, I realize that "0.43 cm^2 V -1 s^-1" and "0.34 cm^2 V -1 s^-1" are values of the carrier mobilities property, rather than being property names themselves. Therefore, the corrected Markdown table with the "Property Name" entities is as follows:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| carrier mobilities |

Note: I have removed "0.43 cm^2 V -1 s^-1" and "0.34 cm^2 V -1 s^-1" from the table as they do not refer to material properties.
